A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's easier to talk about what was good with this movie\, because so much was awful.

The good stuff: Possibly the best scene in a Star Wars movie to date is in TLJ; when Hodo suicided the Star Destroyer in a hyperspace jump. Likewise\, this may have had the best Star Wars fight scene to date; Kylo and Rey in the throne room.

Other than that\, this whole movie could have been 1 hour 30 mins long with the cruft cut out.

This might go down as the worst Star Wars movie ever made. I'm having a hard time picking between this and the prequels for last place.
